text: The 1980 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament was played in Peoria, Illinois after the conclusion of the 1979–1980 regular season. The won their first MVC Tournament title to earn an automatic bid to the 1980 NCAA Tournament. ==Bracket== ==References== Category:1979–80 Missouri Valley Conference men's basketball season Category:Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
title: 1980 Missouri Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament
